data.text:
@Tjsrichman @WalesOnline "Anna Redfern is seeking to appeal " 

It's her appealing the decision and being warned it could make things worse.
@fullynuking @WalesOnline It's her appealing the decision and being warned it could backfire
@Spangles766 @WalesOnline Someone who writes "should of" calls other people retards. 🤦
@WalesOnline People who support her should start a new crowd funder for her so she can take her family on another holiday
@partywareham @WalesOnline It was an exercise in authority over evidence.
@WalesOnline Good luck Anna. Cv19 passes were discriminating & completely unhelpful at stopping a virus. The whole episode was total madness.

@WalesOnline There is no evidence to prove Covid passes were beneficial..about time the Welsh Government was held to account for all the harm it’s caused the people who let’s not forget are actually the ones who have the power to remove them! #theyworkforus
